sentences.sContent: His grammar and syntax, both in oral and written expression, were much better than the average.
sentences.sCn: 无论在口头还是笔头上，他的语法和句法都非常出众。

synos.tran: 语法；[计][语]句法；有秩序的排列

words.tran: 句法的；语法的；依据造句法的
依照句法地；在语句构成上

trans.tranCn: 语法；句法；有秩序的排列
trans.tranOther: the way words are arranged to form sentences or phrases, or the rules of grammar which control this
